bilingual.source: Induced abortion is legal in some countries.
bilingual.target: 人工流产在某些国家是合法的。

bilingual.source: She chose an induced abortion for health reasons.
bilingual.target: 她因为健康原因选择了人工流产。

bilingual.source: They discussed the ethical issues of induced abortion.
bilingual.target: 他们讨论了人工流产的伦理问题。

bilingual.source: The doctor explained the risks of an induced abortion in detail.
bilingual.target: 医生详细解释了人工流产的风险。

bilingual.source: She felt very distressed about her decision for an induced abortion.
bilingual.target: 她对人工流产的决定感到非常痛苦。

bilingual.source: Spontaneous abortion includes accidental spontaneous abortion and recurrent spontaneous abortion.
bilingual.target: 自然流产包括偶然性自然流产和习惯性自然流产.
哺乳期妊娠；药物流产；人工流产；

bilingual.source: Spontaneous abortion at earlier stages of pregnancy is called miscarriage.
bilingual.target: 流产可自然发生,称自然流产.

yingyinNormal.en: And why would I do that? I know Claire lied about the abortion, and I have the journal to prove it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我为什么要那么做呢？我知道克莱尔在流产一事上撒了谎，我也有日记作为证据。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you're against abortion, so my guess is you're repul...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你反对堕胎，所以我猜你……

yingyinNormal.en: The court has ruled only that the provision related to abortion is unenforceable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法庭只裁决与堕胎有关的条款，不具可履行性。

yingyinNormal.en: Stacy Groom. 27 years old. Had an abortion, regretted it. She fulfills all three criteria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯泰茜·格鲁姆，二十七岁，堕胎之后又后悔了，她符合那三个条件。

yingyinNormal.en: A provision empowering the Isenstadts to compel an abortion is an affront to public policy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 赋予伊恩斯塔德夫妇强迫他人堕胎权利的条款有悖公序良俗。

yingyinNormal.en: What a load of bunk. They're trying to extort this lovely young mother-to-be into an abortion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是一派胡言，他们是想把这位年轻可爱的准妈妈歪曲成一个堕胎女孩。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, God. That radical anti-abortion group? It's not radical. Why is something radical merely because you disagree with it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天，那个激进的反堕胎组织。它不激进，为什么仅仅因为你不赞成就要说它是激进的呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't understand you people. We people? You want to get government off our backs until it comes to issues like abortion and euthanasia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不明白你们这类人。我们这类人？一到堕胎和安乐死这类问题上，你就想要政府来管我们了。

yingyinNormal.en: You need a woman who had an abortion there, a woman who was lied to about the procedures, and a woman who suffered measurable harm as a result.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得找到一个在那儿堕胎的女子，院方向她欺瞒了相关的手术事宜并且她必须因此受到重大伤害。

yingyinNormal.en: Because the majority of Americans only support abortion if they don't have to face the fact of it, if they don't have to hear the talk about where to squash...
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为大多数美国人支持堕胎只是因为他们不用直面这个问题，只是因为他们不用听到医生谈论要去挤压胎儿的哪里……

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
